actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States with respect to the offering of prayer in public buildings.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - allows prayer or religious instruction in public places and schools, if such instruction is provided under private auspices. Prohibits infringment of the right of the people to participate or not participate in prayer or religious instruction.

titles.title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States with respect to the offering of prayer in public buildings.
